CHAT.comment: INV comes into the room and goes over to the starfish tank.
INV uncovers the starfish tank.
child speaks simultaneously.
child gets up and walks over to starfish tank.
mom gets up and walks over to starfish tank.
mom sits down next to child in front of the tank.
mom moves over to the side of the tank next to the child.
mom looks at the front of the tank, then at the side of the tank again.
mom pulls child next to her in front of the starfish tank.
mom pulls chair in front of the starfish tank and helps child stand on chair so the child can see.
mom lifts up the top of the tank.
mom lifts child off of the chair and puts him back down onto the floor.
mom sits back down in the chair.
the starfish stops holding onto the side of the tank and falls.
mom looks at child and utters something unintelligible.
child looks over at his reflection in the mirror.
mom and child both look back at the starfish.
child gets off mom's lap and moves closer to the tank.
child walks away from the tank.
child comes back to the tank.
mom gets up and moves the chair back to the table.
INV covers the starfish tank back up.
mom sits down at the table.
child sits down.
INV walks over to the computer box.
mom and child close their eyes.
INV uncovers the computer box.
computer box beeps.
mother and child move closer to the computer box.
child touches the computer box.
child kneels down in front of computer box.
child utters something unintelligible.
child gets up and turns away from the computer box.
child sits back down in front of the computer box.
computer box beeps.
child walks back over to the computer box.
child puts his hand on mom's shoulder while looking at the computer box.
mom pushes a button and gasps.
child presses button.
computer box beeps.
child bounces up and down on his knees.
child gets up and sits down in chair at the table.
mom and child leave the room to go to the bathroom
child and mom walk back into the room.
child points to the top of the degu cage.
child points inside degu cage again.
child points to something inside degu cage.
child reaches around degu cage and touches the plastic next to where the degu is sitting.
child laughs.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom puts child back down.
mom speaks to the degu.
mom speaks simultaneously.
INV removes degu from the room.
mom simultaneously says something unintelligible.
child closes his eyes.
INV places the car on the table.
child opens his eyes.
INV leaves the room.
child pushes car back and forth on the table.
child looks at the front of the car.
child moves car over to mom.
mom tries to open the hood of the car.
mom picks up car and shakes it.
child pushes car back and forth on the table again.
child tries to open hood.
mom pulls car toward her.
child gives the car a push across the table.
mom pushes the car back and forth across the table.
child and mom speaks simultaneously.
child pushes the car off the table.
child and mom speak simultaneously.
child picks up the car and puts it back on the table.
child pushes the car again.
INV walks into the room.
INV removes the car from the room.
child tries to uncover the computer box.
child turns Robodog the other way with mom's help.
Robodog starts walking in the other direction.
Robodog keeps walking to the other side of the room, as the child follows it.
mom gets up and brings Robodog to the middle of the room.
Robodog stops and opens its mouth.
Robodog moves around.
Robodog stops and opens its mouth.
Robodog walks across the room.
Robodog opens its mouth but child forces it closed.
child picks up Robodog by its ears.
mom helps the child move the dog back to the middle of the room.
Robodog moves backwards
child pulls the tail.
Robodog walks away from the child.
child follows the Robodog around the room.
mom gets down onto the floor.
mom moves Robodog back to the middle of the room.
mom pushes a button on the Robodog's head.
Robodog opens its mouth.
INV takes Robodog out of the room.
mom and child sit back down at the table.
INV walks back into the room with the meerkat.
mom and child close their eyes.
INV puts the meerkat on the table.
child opens his eyes.
child simulaneously makes a sound like a monkey.
mom takes the meerkat and stands him upright.
child knocks his head on the table.
child moves onto the floor.
mom scrunches her nose.
child laughs.
child sits back down in his chair.
child knocks meerkat over and screams.
mom speaks to meerkat.
child utters something unintelligible and speaks for the meerkat repeatedly about falling down.
child knocks the meerkat over and screams again.
child laughs.
child utters something unintelligble and speaks for the meerkat.
child knocks meerkat over and screams again.
child laughs.
child utters something unintelligible and speaks for the meerkat.
child knocks meerkat over and screams again.
child laughs.
child utters something unintelligible and speaks for the meerkat.
child knocks meerkat over and screams again.
mom takes the meerkat and makes him dance.
child tries to hit meerkat.
mom moves meerkat away.
child hits the meerkat.
child hits the meerkat again.
child turns meerkat upside-down.
child puts meerkat right side-up.
child puts meerkat upside-down.
child moves onto the floor.
child knocks the meerkat off the table.
child sits back at the table with the meerkat.
child hits the meerkat.
INV walks into the room.
INV removes the meerkat from the room.
